meanings.sent1: The brandied fruitcake had a rich, sweet taste.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the brandied cherries in her dessert.
meanings.sent3: The brandied sauce made the dish extra special.
meanings.sent4: The brandied peaches were like little bursts of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the brandied plums filled the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: Drunk or intoxicated from consuming brandy.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled out of the bar, brandied and giggling.
meanings.sent2: She felt brandied after a few glasses of brandy.
meanings.sent3: The brandied guest kept telling jokes at the party.
meanings.sent4: The brandied revelers danced wildly under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: His brandied laughter echoed through the night.
